class InteractiveSSOAuth:
    """
    ä½¿ç”¨ MSAL çš„äº’å‹•å¼ç€è¦½å™¨èªè­‰
    å°±åƒç”¨é›»å­ç™¼ç¥¨è¼‰å…·ä¸€æ¨£ï¼Œä¸€æ¬¡è¨­å®šçµ‚èº«å—ç”¨ï¼
    """
    def __init__(self, tenant_id=None):
        # ä½¿ç”¨ Microsoft çš„å…¬é–‹ client ID for SharePoint
        self.client_id = "d3590ed6-52b3-4102-aeff-aad2292ab01c"  # Microsoft Office
        self.tenant_id = tenant_id or "common"
        self.authority = f"https://login.microsoftonline.com/{self.tenant_id}"
        self.scope = ["https://graph.microsoft.com/.default"]
        self.app = None
        self.result = None
        self.token_cache_file = "sharepoint_token_cache.pkl"
        
    def load_token_cache(self):
        """è¼‰å…¥å·²å„²å­˜çš„ token"""
        try:
            with open(self.token_cache_file, 'rb') as f:
                cache_data = pickle.load(f)
                if cache_data.get('expires_at', 0) > datetime.now().timestamp():
                    self.result = cache_data
                    print("âœ… è¼‰å…¥å·²å„²å­˜çš„èªè­‰ï¼ˆé‚„åœ¨æœ‰æ•ˆæœŸå…§ï¼‰")
                    return True
                else:
                    print("â° å·²å„²å­˜çš„èªè­‰å·²éæœŸ")
        except:
            pass
        return False
        
    def save_token_cache(self):
        """å„²å­˜ token"""
        if self.result:
            # åŠ å…¥éæœŸæ™‚é–“
            cache_data = dict(self.result)
            cache_data['expires_at'] = (datetime.now() + timedelta(hours=1)).timestamp()
            
            with open(self.token_cache_file, 'wb') as f:
                pickle.dump(cache_data, f)
            print("ğŸ’¾ èªè­‰å·²å„²å­˜ï¼Œä¸‹æ¬¡å¯ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨")
    
    def authenticate_interactive(self):
        """äº’å‹•å¼ç€è¦½å™¨èªè­‰"""
        # å…ˆå˜—è©¦è¼‰å…¥å·²å„²å­˜çš„ token
        if self.load_token_cache():
            return self.result
            
        print("ğŸŒ æ­£åœ¨é–‹å•Ÿç€è¦½å™¨é€²è¡Œèªè­‰...")
        print("   è«‹åœ¨ç€è¦½å™¨ä¸­å®Œæˆç™»å…¥")
        print("   å¦‚æœå·²ç¶“ç™»å…¥å…¬å¸å¸³è™Ÿï¼Œæ‡‰è©²æœƒè‡ªå‹•å®Œæˆï¼")
        
        # å»ºç«‹ MSAL app
        self.app = PublicClientApplication(
            self.client_id,
            authority=self.authority
        )
        
        # å–å¾—å¸³è™Ÿï¼ˆå¦‚æœæœ‰çš„è©±ï¼‰
        accounts = self.app.get_accounts()
        
        if accounts:
            # å˜—è©¦éœé»˜å–å¾— token
            print("ğŸ” ç™¼ç¾å·²ç™»å…¥å¸³è™Ÿï¼Œå˜—è©¦éœé»˜èªè­‰...")
            result = self.app.acquire_token_silent(
                self.scope,
                account=accounts[0]
            )
            if result and "access_token" in result:
                print("âœ… éœé»˜èªè­‰æˆåŠŸï¼")
                self.result = result
                self.save_token_cache()
                return result
        
        # äº’å‹•å¼èªè­‰
        result = self.app.acquire_token_interactive(
            scopes=self.scope,
            prompt="select_account"  # è®“ä½¿ç”¨è€…é¸æ“‡å¸³è™Ÿ
        )
        
        if "access_token" in result:
            print("âœ… èªè­‰æˆåŠŸï¼")
            self.result = result
            self.save_token_cache()
            return result
        else:
            print(f"âŒ èªè­‰å¤±æ•—ï¼š{result.get('error_description', 'æœªçŸ¥éŒ¯èª¤')}")
            return None
## Step 4: ä½¿ç”¨ Office365 API çš„èªè­‰ Context

class ModernAuthContext:
    """
    ä½¿ç”¨ç¾ä»£é©—è­‰çš„ SharePoint Context
    å°±åƒç”¨è¡Œå‹•æ”¯ä»˜ä¸€æ¨£å…ˆé€²ï¼
    """
    def __init__(self, site_url):
        self.site_url = site_url
        self.ctx = None
        self.auth = None
        
        # å¾ URL è§£æ tenant
        parsed = urlparse(site_url)
        self.tenant = parsed.hostname.split('.')[0]
        
    def connect(self):
        """ä½¿ç”¨äº’å‹•å¼èªè­‰é€£æ¥"""
        # ä½¿ç”¨äº’å‹•å¼èªè­‰
        self.auth = InteractiveSSOAuth()
        auth_result = self.auth.authenticate_interactive()
        
        if not auth_result:
            return False
            
        # å–å¾—ä½¿ç”¨è€…è³‡è¨Š
        user_info = auth_result.get('id_token_claims', {})
        username = user_info.get('preferred_username', '')
        
        print(f"ğŸ‘¤ ç™»å…¥èº«ä»½ï¼š{username}")
        
        # å»ºç«‹ ClientContext
        # ä½¿ç”¨ cookie èªè­‰æ–¹å¼
        auth_context = AuthenticationContext(self.site_url)
        
        # å–å¾— cookie
        if auth_context.acquire_token_for_user(username, password=''):
            self.ctx = ClientContext(self.site_url, auth_context)
        else:
            # å¦‚æœå¤±æ•—ï¼Œæ”¹ç”¨å…¶ä»–æ–¹å¼
            print("ğŸ’¡ å˜—è©¦å…¶ä»–èªè­‰æ–¹å¼...")
            self.ctx = self._create_context_with_token(auth_result['access_token'])
            
        # æ¸¬è©¦é€£ç·š
        try:
            web = self.ctx.web
            self.ctx.load(web)
            self.ctx.execute_query()
            print(f"âœ… æˆåŠŸé€£æ¥åˆ°ï¼š{web.properties.get('Title', 'SharePoint ç¶²ç«™')}")
            return True
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"âŒ é€£ç·šæ¸¬è©¦å¤±æ•—ï¼š{str(e)}")
            return False
    
    def _create_context_with_token(self, access_token):
        """ä½¿ç”¨ access token å»ºç«‹ context"""
        ctx = ClientContext(self.site_url)
        
        # è‡ªè¨‚èªè­‰è™•ç†
        def _auth_handler(request):
            request.set_header('Authorization', f'Bearer {access_token}')
            request.verify = False
            return True
            
        ctx.pending_request().beforeExecute += _auth_handler
        return ctx
## Step 5: SharePoint åˆ†äº«ç®¡ç†å™¨ï¼ˆä¿æŒé€£ç·šï¼‰

class SharePointManager:
    """
    SharePoint åˆ†äº«ç®¡ç†å™¨
    ä¸€æ¬¡èªè­‰ï¼Œå¤šæ¬¡ä½¿ç”¨ï¼
    """
    _instance = None
    
    def __new__(cls, site_url=None):
        """å–®ä¾‹æ¨¡å¼ï¼Œç¢ºä¿åªæœ‰ä¸€å€‹å¯¦ä¾‹"""
        if cls._instance is None:
            cls._instance = super().__new__(cls)
            cls._instance.initialized = False
        return cls._instance
        
    def __init__(self, site_url=None):
        if not self.initialized and site_url:
            self.site_url = site_url
            self.auth_ctx = ModernAuthContext(site_url)
            self.ctx = None
            self.connected = False
            self.initialized = True
            
    def ensure_connected(self):
        """ç¢ºä¿å·²é€£æ¥ï¼ˆåªåœ¨ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡éœ€è¦èªè­‰ï¼‰"""
        if not self.connected:
            print("ğŸ” ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡ä½¿ç”¨ï¼Œéœ€è¦é€²è¡Œèªè­‰...")
            if self.auth_ctx.connect():
                self.ctx = self.auth_ctx.ctx
                self.connected = True
                print("\nâœ¨ èªè­‰å®Œæˆï¼ä¹‹å¾Œçš„æ“ä½œéƒ½ä¸éœ€è¦å†èªè­‰äº†")
            else:
                raise Exception("ç„¡æ³•é€£æ¥åˆ° SharePoint")
        return self.connected
        
    def find_user(self, display_name):
        """å°‹æ‰¾ä½¿ç”¨è€…"""
        self.ensure_connected()
        
        print(f"\nğŸ” æœå°‹ä½¿ç”¨è€…ï¼š{display_name}")
        
        try:
            users = self.ctx.web.site_users
            self.ctx.load(users)
            self.ctx.execute_query()
            
            found_users = []
            for user in users:
                props = user.properties
                title = props.get('Title', '')
                email = props.get('Email', '')
                
                if not email or 'system' in title.lower():
                    continue
                    
                if (display_name.lower() in title.lower() or 
                    display_name.lower() in email.lower()):
                    found_users.append({
                        'Title': title,
                        'Email': email,
                        'LoginName': props.get('LoginName')
                    })
                    print(f"  âœ… {title} - {email}")
                    
            if not found_users:
                print("  âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°ä½¿ç”¨è€…")
                
            return found_users
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"âŒ æœå°‹éŒ¯èª¤ï¼š{str(e)}")
            return []
            
    def share_folder(self, folder_path, user_email_or_login, permission='Contribute'):
        """åˆ†äº«è³‡æ–™å¤¾ï¼ˆä¸ä¸­æ–·ç¹¼æ‰¿ï¼‰"""
        self.ensure_connected()
        
        print(f"\nğŸ“ åˆ†äº«è³‡æ–™å¤¾...")
        print(f"   è·¯å¾‘ï¼š{folder_path}")
        print(f"   å°è±¡ï¼š{user_email_or_login}")
        print(f"   æ¬Šé™ï¼š{permission}")
        
        try:
            # å–å¾—è³‡æ–™å¤¾
            folder = self.ctx.web.get_folder_by_server_relative_url(folder_path)
            self.ctx.load(folder)
            self.ctx.execute_query()
            
            # å–å¾— list item
            list_item = folder.listItemAllFields
            self.ctx.load(list_item)
            self.ctx.execute_query()
            
            # ç¢ºä¿ä½¿ç”¨è€…
            user = self.ctx.web.ensure_user(user_email_or_login)
            self.ctx.execute_query()
            
            # å–å¾—è§’è‰²å®šç¾©
            role_def = self.ctx.web.role_definitions.get_by_name(permission)
            self.ctx.load(role_def)
            self.ctx.execute_query()
            
            # æ–°å¢æ¬Šé™ï¼ˆä¸ä¸­æ–·ç¹¼æ‰¿ï¼‰
            list_item.role_assignments.add_role_assignment(user, role_def)
            self.ctx.execute_query()
            
            print(f"\nğŸ‰ åˆ†äº«æˆåŠŸï¼")
            print(f"   {user.properties.get('Title')} ç¾åœ¨å¯ä»¥å­˜å–äº†")
            return True
            
        except Exception as e:
            print(f"\nâŒ åˆ†äº«å¤±æ•—ï¼š{str(e)}")
            return False

def quick_share(site_url, folder_base_url, folder_name):
    """
    å¿«é€Ÿåˆ†äº«å‡½å¼
    åªè¦ç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡èªè­‰ï¼Œä¹‹å¾Œéƒ½ä¸ç”¨ï¼
    """
    global manager
    
    # å¦‚æœé‚„æ²’æœ‰ç®¡ç†å™¨ï¼Œå»ºç«‹ä¸€å€‹
    if manager is None:
        print("ğŸš€ åˆå§‹åŒ– SharePoint ç®¡ç†å™¨...")
        manager = SharePointManager(site_url)
    
    # å»ºæ§‹å®Œæ•´è·¯å¾‘
    parsed = urlparse(folder_base_url)
    base_path = parsed.path
    if not base_path.endswith('/'):
        base_path += '/'
    full_path = base_path + folder_name
    
    print(f"\nğŸ“‚ è™•ç†è³‡æ–™å¤¾ï¼š{folder_name}")
    
    # å°‹æ‰¾ä½¿ç”¨è€…
    users = manager.find_user(folder_name)
    
    if not users:
        # æ‰‹å‹•è¼¸å…¥
        email = input("\nğŸ’¡ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°åŒåä½¿ç”¨è€…ï¼Œè«‹è¼¸å…¥ email: ").strip()
        if email:
            return manager.share_folder(full_path, email)
        return False
        
    # é¸æ“‡ä½¿ç”¨è€…
    if len(users) == 1:
        selected = users[0]
    else:
        print("\nè«‹é¸æ“‡ï¼š")
        for i, u in enumerate(users):
            print(f"  {i+1}. {u['Title']} - {u['Email']}")
        choice = input("é¸æ“‡ (é è¨­ 1): ").strip() or "1"
        selected = users[int(choice)-1]
        
    # åˆ†äº«
    return manager.share_folder(
        full_path,
        selected['LoginName'] or selected['Email']

    """
    print(f"ğŸ“¦ æ‰¹æ¬¡è™•ç† {len(folder_names)} å€‹è³‡æ–™å¤¾")
